H0.text: How many players are on the field in a hurling team. 11

H1.text: How many players are on the field in a hurling team. 12

H2.text: How many players are on the field in a hurling team. 13

H3.text: How many players are on the field in a hurling team. 15

A5.text: Teams consist of fifteen players: a goalkeeper, three full backs, three half backs, two midfielders, three half forwards and three full forwards.
